TaskBot

The Line® chatbot that can help you get through your daily tasks, do things better, get more organized, crush goals. Now available for you to add as friend on Line®!

F.A.Q.

Q: How to add TaskBot as my friend?

A: You can add by using this ID @708scevp, or by scanning the QR Code provided.


Q: Can I add TaskBot to a group?

A: Currently TaskBot only supports private messaging to store tasks.


Q: How many tasks can TaskBot store?

A: TaskBot can store an unlimited amount of tasks, so you are not limited.

Commands

CommandDescription
!add <task>Adds a new task.
!finish <task>Finishes a task.
!finishallFinishes all the tasks.
!tasksShows all unfinished tasks.
!helpBrings up the command list.
!aboutShows detail about TaskBot.
